name: Touhou Spell Bubble
overview: Touhou Spell Bubble is a chaotic mashup of Taito's classic action puzzle game Puzzle Bobble and the Tōhō (Touhou) series. At its core, it keeps Puzzle Bobble's core gameplay; the top of the screen is filled with bubbles of various colours, and players shoot coloured balls from their cannon at the bottom of the screen in order to create combos and clear the screen. Layered on top of this is a rhythm game element, with players rewarded for shooting bubbles to the beat of the music. It features 20 fully voiced playable characters from across the Tōhō series along with a large variety of arrangements of classic Tōhō songs, with arrangements by both Taito's in-house sound team and guest musicians.
